chunk_text: #### Are the tasting fees for each winery included? Customers can receive a full refund of the deposit or credit with a 7-day notice of cancellation. Additionally, customers will receive a full refund or credit if the Operator cancels the reservation due to inclement weather or other unforeseen circumstances. West Hills will not be held liable for cancellation fees from any wineries, third-party contracts, or fees associated with last-minute changes made within 7 days of the tour date.
